results.question: What is Bootstrap?
results.correct_answer: A front-end toolkit used to build websites / user interfaces

results.question: Which version of Bootstrap dropped support for Internet Explorer?
What is the main purpose of the Bootstrap grid system?
results.correct_answer: Organizing layout and placing UI elements

results.question: How can you include Bootstrap in your project?
results.correct_answer: By adding the CDN links directly in the HTML file
incorrect_answers: By downloading the Source Files and customizing them using Sass
By using a package manager like npm to install Bootstrap
By importing the Bootstrap library in the back-end code

How many responsive breakpoints are there in Bootstrap 5?

results.correct_answer: Mix and match classes for finer control
